com.mingweisamuel.zyra

Class RiotApi.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mingweisamuel.zyra.RiotApi.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    RiotApi

    public static class RiotApi.Builder
extends Object
    Riot API builder for obtaining instances of the Riot API.

      • setRateLimitsDefaultProduction

        public RiotApi.Builder setRateLimitsDefaultProduction()
        Set the rate limits to the default limits for a production API key. 3,000 requests per 10 seconds, 180,000 requests per 10 minutes.
        Returns:
        This, for chaining.
